::: callout-tip
## Objective

The OLS estimator, under some conditions, has some neat properties. In this session, we will described these properties and some of the necessary conditions for these properties to hold.
:::

## Session Outline

1.  Quizz
1.  Discussion on research questions
3.  Estimates and uncertainty
4.  Some properties estimators can have
5.  Optimality conditions: conditions under which the OLS estimator has some of these properties
5.  Mathematical derivation (bias and variance of the OLS estimator)
